title: First concepts and ideas
content: Started taking pictures for first posts

title: First online version
content: Deployed for the first time, but in order to fix the deployment problems, we had to deploy and empty app

title: Now we support images
content: Now we have a first usable version, posts with images and singular pages

title: Fully migrated to S3
content: Our images were not stored really well, so now we have it in the cloud, it helps our app run better as well

title: Added Releases category
content: Now we will have a better registry of how our advances are going

title: Added States
content: We are starting to develop a way to show issues that has already been solved, for now we have only a tag, but soon other functionalities will be added
